title: Communication at Work: Business Education for Technical Minds
desc:
The course will take place over 2 consecutive mornings, from 9:00AM to 12:30PM on Thursday and Friday . 
 The curriculum developed by? Revz.in ?is designed to focus on long term career success by teaching technical employees how to become skilled communicators at work.? 
 Our Modules cover advanced principles of delivering powerful presentations, running internal and external meetings, and email writing techniques that elicit action. Our in-person courses have limited class sizes to enable students to apply the best practices that they learn immediately through interactive exercises and class discussions.? 
 Course Outcomes
